course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Advanced Network Management (CISCO - ICND)
course.description: Combining extensive lab work with lectures and WWW self-paced learning materials provided by the Cisco Networking Academy Program, this course helps students develop practical network administration and management skills. This course is designed to prepare students to take (and pass) the Cisco Certified Network Administrator (CCNA) certification examination.

reviews.title: No chance to miss any marks, otherwise GG
reviews.comment_content:
1. Distance vector vs Link-stated vector protocol
2. RIP & IGRP
3. EIGRP
4. VLSM
5. Access Control Lists (ACL)
6. Extending Switched Networks with Virtual LANs(VLAN)
7. NAT and PAT
8. IPv6

內容上我覺得係幾正 對比起ISOM 3180 深入好多
如果想skip 3180的話可以email percy,
有人係無讀3180下直接讀3380
reviews.comment_teaching:
Percy 教書方面就非常好呢樣就係人都知嫁啦
唔明就教到明 難明的concept都可以教得好易
有lecture videos 提供 無attendance 方便唔鐘意上堂的人

不過呢個course的安排就非常差
兩樣
1. final 上堂考, 分兩日 MC同LQ 各1.5小時到
問題黎 你做MC個日剩好多時間 但你做LQ個日竟然唔夠時間
搞到percy佢自己都要加時比學生 當然 佢有問過大家上堂考o唔ok 大家都話好 但點會expect到份卷的長度係咁唔balance?
2. 出grade 等到佛誕
5月5號考完 6月2號先出grade 我17號考個科 200個學生 都出左好耐grade, 3380 得50幾個人讀 你6月2號先出grade?
你實會話有好其他IS course要搞, 但你跟次序公平d啦
ISOM4300 遲考咁多 你又咁早出grade

總結： 就算教得好都唔再reg percy course
上個sem係咁 今個sem又係咁
reviews.comment_grading:
(1) Mid-term exam 20% (24/25) mean 22.7 10個滿分
(2) 4 lab assignment 30% (29.5/30) mean 28.9
(3) Final 50%(23%MC + 27%%LQ)  無比分直接出grade

B- 原全唔知咩事 死無對証
佢出grade就跟比例ge 你幾高分都好 唔係top 25%都唔會有A range
reg呢個course的人睇路啦
reviews.comment_workload:
好低workload
同2-credit course 差唔多
